headline: North Dakota Oil Heartland Feels Aftershock of Chevron, Hess Corp. Merger
summary: North Dakota’s oil heartland is feeling the aftershocks of Chevron’s $53-billion merger with Hess Corp., as the supermajor trims more than 100 jobs across Minot and Tioga.

raw.headline: North Dakota Oil Heartland Feels Aftershock of Chevron, Hess Corp. Merger
raw.summary: North Dakota’s oil heartland is feeling the aftershocks of Chevron’s $53-billion merger with Hess Corp., as the supermajor trims more than 100 jobs across Minot and Tioga.

headline: Chevron (CVX): Assessing Valuation After El Segundo Refinery Fire and Legal Action
summary: Chevron (CVX) is dealing with the aftermath of a major fire at its El Segundo refinery, as the company works to restart processing units and production continues at reduced levels. The event triggered a class action lawsuit from local residents who cite health and economic damages, introducing operational and legal risks for this key California fuel supplier. See our latest analysis for Chevron. Chevron’s latest challenges come amid a year of steady, if unspectacular, progress. The share...

headline: Evaluating Chevron’s True Value After OPEC Output Increase Announcement
summary: If you are considering what to do with your Chevron shares or thinking about starting a position, you are certainly not alone. Over the last year, Chevron has put up a respectable 8.9% gain and is up a remarkable 161.9% over the past five years. That said, recent momentum has cooled, with shares slipping 0.2% in the last week and rising just 0.8% in the past month. The year-to-date return stands at 5.6%, reflecting a period that has seen both opportunity and caution in the oil and gas...

headline: Chevron Battles Back: Restart Efforts Underway at El Segundo Refinery
summary: After a major fire disrupts production at CVX's El Segundo refinery, the energy giant works to restart key units as jet fuel prices soar across California.

raw.headline: Chevron Battles Back: Restart Efforts Underway at El Segundo Refinery

headline: Chevron Appoints Kevin McLachlan to Lead Global Exploration
summary: Chevron Corporation has named industry veteran Kevin McLachlan as Vice President of Exploration, effective November 1, as longtime executive Liz Schwarze prepares to retire after 36 years.
